cards.name: Billy the Kid
cards.description: A runaway teenager turned infamous gunman outlaw involved in the Lincoln Country War, a violent feud between mercantile factions in New Mexico.

abilities.name: Kid Tactics
abilities.description: Shoots an extremely powerful attack at all enemies.

abilities.name: Out With a Bang
abilities.description: When she dies, reduce the HP of the killer by half.

cards.name: Wyatt Earp
cards.description: A former pimp, thief, con artist, and gambler who ended up as a law enforcement officer renowned for winning a gunfight in the Oklahoma Corral.

abilities.name: Redemption
abilities.description: Buffs allies.

abilities.name: Lawman's Resolve
abilities.description: Gains +50% defense when HP drops below 50%.

cards.name: Butch Cassidy
cards.description: A nonviolent outlaw duo known for robbing trains, daring escapes, and strategic planning.

abilities.name: A Double Life
abilities.description: Has two lives. When Sundance dies, Butch revives with 50% HP once per battle.

abilities.name: Sundance
abilities.description: Buffs allies.

cards.name: Calamity Jane
cards.description: A orphan who became a skilled shooter, rider, performer, and partner to Wild Bill while taking care of her five younger siblings.

abilities.name: Older Sister
abilities.description: Passively heals allies for 20% of their max HP at the start of each turn.

abilities.name: Dual Calamity
abilities.description: Gains a damage boost of 20% when paired with Wild Bill.

cards.name: Wild Bill Hickok
cards.description: Renowned for his sharpshooting and bravery, where his exploits as a lawman and gambler in Kansas and Nebraska towns cemented his legendary status.

abilities.name: Sharpshooter
abilities.description: Deals a huge amount of damage to a single target.

abilities.name: Dual Calamity
abilities.description: Gains a damage boost of 20% when paired with Calamity Jane.

cards.name: Doc Holliday
cards.description: A dentist, gambler, and gunfighter, not scared to start and end a fight.

abilities.name: Party Heal
abilities.description: Heals all allies for 30% of their max HP.

abilities.name: Gambler's Punch
abilities.description: Deals a random amount of damage to all enemies and has a 25% chance to stun them for 1 turn.

cards.name: Bass Reeves
cards.description: An impressive marshal who made up to 3,000 arrests on the most notorious of criminal, a force to not be reckoned with.

abilities.name: Winchester's Snipe
abilities.description: Uses stealth learned from Cherokee tribe to snipe a single target, dealing a huge amount of damage and has a 25% chance to reduce their attack by 50% for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Hand Behind Your Back
abilities.description: Reduces the attack of all enemies by 20% for 3 turns.

cards.name: Belle Starr
cards.description: An American outlaw and a skilled shooter, she's a reaper dressed in black ready to strike.

abilities.name: Double Barrel Shot
abilities.description: Shoots two powerful attacks at random enemies.

abilities.name: Reaper's Mark
abilities.description: Marks an enemy for 3 turns, increasing the damage they take by 20%.

cards.name: Black Bart
cards.description: A gentleman bandit known for his poetic verses left at the scenes of his crimes, a charismatic figure in the Old West.

abilities.name: Words of the Wise
abilities.description: Buffs allies' attack and defense by 20% for 3 turns.

abilities.name: Poetic Justice
abilities.description: Deals damage to all enemies based on the number of buffs on allies.

cards.name: Charles Goodnight
cards.description: A legendary cattle rancher and trailblazer, known for his pioneering spirit and contributions to the development of the American West.

abilities.name: Cattle Drive
abilities.description: Increases the attack of all allies by 15% for 3 turns.

abilities.name: Trailblazer's Resilience
abilities.description: Reduces damage taken by 10% for all allies when HP drops below 50%.
